__e: Jesse, I saw the look on Cole's face and the others' as they were leaving.
Sam, these men, the Coles, some of the others, they're not doing what Ed said, are they?
- I'll always think of him as a... - He's a top hand.
Trust me. I will be very gentle.
I want you to tie into him.
"As long as you don't glue or cut, your imagination is the limit!..."
You're a hard man to keep up with.
With no less than three telephones in Mr. Cole's house, you had to leave to make a phone call?
It has been so for years, Cole, you know.
Maybe Cole is trying to hide something from the police ?
If it's about Cole, there's nothing to discuss.
You know, you could say that Cole didn't know what he was doing.
I don't know what you're talkin' about!
